item.title: FIM Custom Expressions inside Custom Expressions?
item.description: Recently, I needed to take Longitude and Latitude data that was given to me in the following format and break it into its individual components and then flow it out to AD. Let’s suppose the data looks like this: “Point -10.1223 45.945” I could just use the Left and Right functions to get out the Longitude and Latitude. The problem was it could also look like this depending on the level of precision:
